a very annoyed expression: She was clearly annoyed, as you could tell from the scowl on her face. He opened the door again, not bothering to hide his fierce scowl.
More examplesFewer examplesHe had a bald head, a huge belly, and a menacing scowl.His scowl had deepened, and there was a note of warning in his voice.He slumped in his battered chair, his face a furious scowl.
